DOC.detailed_description: The study design double-blind , parallel-group trial , include total 250 participant , age 5-11 year , diagnosis asthma history least 1 asthma exacerbation treat oral corticosteroid prior year . All participant treat 48 week open-label fluticasone 44 mcg 2 puff twice daily . During 48-week treatment period , participant receive randomize blind therapy 7 day time enter `` yellow zone '' ( onset symptom previously associate upper respiratory illness subsequent asthma exacerbation ) . Yellow zone therapy fluticasone 44 220 mcg 2 puff twice daily .
